startUrls.title: Restaurant URLs
startUrls.description: Google Maps place or search URLs to scrape reviews from.

maxItems.title: Max Reviews
maxItems.description: Maximum number of reviews to scrape per restaurant.

newerThan.title: Newer Than
newerThan.description: Only collect reviews newer than this date (YYYY-MM-DD). Scraping stops early once older reviews are reached. Google uses relative dates (~1 month precision), so a few extra reviews may be collected.
